This is actually a good written ntr story, even though the girl loves the cock, she still choose her heart/ the guy. And also the platform use is unique, first time I've read an ntr doujin consists almost mainly on conversations in a smartphone. The feeling of doing something wrong snooping someone's privacy, and expecting finding out she is cheating, is maybe relatable to some and thrilling to the heart. Also the videos taken and the conversations are unbearable to watch and read if you're new to ntr. But this is actually a masterpiece. They even used the menstrual period to hotten things up at the second chapter which makes it also unique and actually pretty lewd. I'd say this is the 2nd best ntr I've read. The art is godly, it has uniqueness, lewdness, and great coloring. The story is thrilling, and the ending is maybe predictable to some, but it's still satisfying for me because it's a win win for everyone, no one loses. 9.5/10

Now I know the reason I got so sick to the point of puking on my desk from reading part 1, it's because I sympathized with 2 characters: Yuna and Daisuke. Because in my mind I have the image that Yuna and Daisuke are both normal people who loved each other. And then then I read part 2, the reason it felt better because it has been cleared that Yuna is a fucking whore, so the only one I sympathized with is Daisuke here. When I reached the end of part 2 it starts to clear up, and the cliffhanger at the end fills me with anticipation. Finally part 3 came in, we finally get the full picture of the situation: Yuuya is not the "bad guy" here, sure he is the antagonist of the story, but the "bad guys" here and by "bad" I mean mentally sick fucks that no one can sympathize with, are actually Daisuke and Yuna. Both of them are never the normal couples getting NTR'd by the antagonist like the ones being implied in Part 1. I enjoyed this series, 9/10. (I hate red hair guy)
